parameters.jsCode: var raw = $input.first().json; var body = raw.body || raw; var data = body.data || body; var tenantId = String(body.tenantId || data.tenantId || ''); var reference = String(body.reference || data.reference || ''); var nom = String(body.nom || data.nom || ''); var UUID_RE = /^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$/i; if (!tenantId || !UUID_RE.test(tenantId)) throw new Error('Tenant ID requis'); if (!reference) throw new Error('Reference requis'); if (!nom) throw new Error('Nom requis'); function esc(v) { return v == null ? '' : String(v).replace(/'/g, "''"); } var id = 'gen_random_uuid()'; var description = esc(body.description || data.description || ''); var clientId = esc(body.clientId || data.clientId || ''); var adresseChantier = esc(body.adresseChantier || data.adresseChantier || ''); var codePostal = esc(body.codePostal || data.codePostal || ''); var ville = esc(body.ville || data.ville || ''); var responsableId = esc(body.responsableId || data.responsableId || ''); var statut = esc(body.statut || data.statut || 'planifie'); var dateDebut = body.dateDebut || data.dateDebut || null; var dateFinPrevue = body.dateFinPrevue || data.dateFinPrevue || null; var dateFinReelle = body.dateFinReelle || data.dateFinReelle || null; var montantMarche = body.montantMarche || data.montantMarche || 0; var montantFacture = body.montantFacture || data.montantFacture || 0; var tauxAvancement = body.tauxAvancement || data.tauxAvancement || 0; var lotPrincipal = body.lotPrincipal || data.lotPrincipal || ''; var notes = esc(body.notes || data.notes || ''); var query = 'INSERT INTO btp_chantiers (id, tenant_id, reference, nom, description, client_id, adresse_chantier, code_postal, ville, responsable_id, statut, date_debut, date_fin_prevue, date_fin_reelle, montant_marche, montant_facture, taux_avancement, lot_principal, notes, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (gen_random_uuid(), \'' + esc(tenantId) + '\', \'' + esc(reference) + '\', \'' + esc(nom) + '\', \'' + description + '\', \'' + clientId + '\', \'' + adresseChantier + '\', \'' + codePostal + '\', \'' + ville + '\', \'' + responsableId + '\', \'' + statut + '\', ' + (dateDebut ? '\'' + dateDebut + '\'' : 'NULL') + ', ' + (dateFinPrevue ? '\'' + dateFinPrevue + '\'' : 'NULL') + ', ' + (dateFinReelle ? '\'' + dateFinReelle + '\'' : 'NULL') + ', ' + montantMarche + ', ' + montantFacture + ', ' + tauxAvancement + ', \'' + esc(lotPrincipal) + '\', \'' + notes + '\', NOW(), NOW()) RETURNING *'; return [{json: {query}}];

var rows = $input.first().json; var chantier = rows.length > 0 ? rows[0] : null; if (!chantier) { return [{json: {success: false, error: 'Erreur lors de la cr√©ation'}}]; } return [{json: {success: true, data: chantier}}];
